title: I Bet I Can
description: I Bet I Can is about a bear that attempts to overcome a variety of obstacles. Unfortunately, he doesn't achieve any of the goals he sets for himself until the end of the book.
meta: grabbed, hawk, kangaroo, snap, splash, splat

Past-Tense Verbs : Recognize and understand that some verbs can be changed to past tense by adding the -ed suffix
Onomatopoeia : Identify and understand the use of onomatopoeia
